Communicate better with the most effective writing assistant, proofreader and editor. Be understood.

InstaText improves your text, making it more readable and understandable by correcting grammatical errors, improving spelling and punctuation, refining writing style, and optimizing word choice—all while maintaining your unique tone of voice.

🎯 Communicate effectively: Write clearly and concisely, produce high quality sentences.
🚀 Boost productivity: Improve your text interactively and quickly obtain ideas for improvements.
🥇 Upgrade your writing skills: Make your writing stand out and learn how to write better English.

Use InstaText for emails, messages, documents, projects, and social media without copy & paste. Trusted by millions from 220+ countries.

Your privacy is our priority – secure, transparent, and user-controlled:
✍️ User-initiated improvements: You control which text to send for improvement and when.
🛡️ No text storage: Your texts are never stored on our servers.
🔒 No data sharing with 3rd parties: Your information stays with us, always.
🌍 EU-based cloud infrastructure, compliant with EU data laws: Your data is protected under strict EU regulations.

Want to write like the expert you are? 👉 Install InstaText now!

Continuous improvements are made based on user feedback. For questions or suggestions, reach out to chrome@instatext.io.
